# Faceting

In this chapter, we will introduce facets, which are usually used to combine continuous and categorical data.

```{r,fig.width=4.8, fig.height=4}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

mycol = "#7192E3"  
ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width)) +  
  geom_point(color = mycol) +  
  facet_wrap(~Species) +  
  theme_grey(18)
```
